subject: Please pardon me, i will love
body:
Please pardon me, i will love to help poor people through you' I thought I would message you to ask if you can handle it. Please don't be angry?
Waiting for your clarification.
Senior HR Manager,
Bureau Fange Group

subject: Re: Please pardon me, i will love
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm always interested in helping those in need. Could you please provide more details about how I can assist through your organization? What kind of help are you looking for?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Denise
